channel.title: How i make pi server unspawnable server
channel.description:
hello guys my server is a spawnable server and i want a unspawnable server
i willthat

can anyone help me how to do
I know i am dutch thats why bad english i hope you guys know my problem

item.title: How i make pi server unspawnable server
item.dc:creator: @totalystylin1 totalystylin1
item.description:
@totalystylin1 wrote:

etc…

For players right, use this:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("item") && (c.playerRights >= 3)) { {
etc…

item.title: How i make pi server unspawnable server
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

Go to your commands class and find the item or pickup command and delete it from mods and regular players being able to use it.
